CSAS_OUTPUT_0.KsqlTopic.Source.schema: `ID` STRING KEY, `BOOL_ARRAY` ARRAY<BOOLEAN>, `INT_ARRAY` ARRAY<INTEGER>, `BIGINT_ARRAY` ARRAY<BIGINT>, `DOUBLE_ARRAY` ARRAY<DOUBLE>, `STRING_ARRAY` ARRAY<STRING>, `DECIMAL_ARRAY` ARRAY<DECIMAL(2, 1)>

CSAS_OUTPUT_0.OUTPUT.schema: `ID` STRING KEY, `BOOL_MIN` BOOLEAN, `INT_MIN` INTEGER, `BIGINT_MIN` BIGINT, `DOUBLE_MIN` DOUBLE, `STRING_MIN` STRING, `DECIMAL_MIN` DECIMAL(2, 1)

testCase.name: array_min
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID STRING KEY, bool_array ARRAY<BOOLEAN>, int_array ARRAY<INT>, bigint_array ARRAY<BIGINT>, double_array ARRAY<DOUBLE>, string_array ARRAY<STRING>, decimal_array ARRAY<DECIMAL(2,1)>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, array_min(bool_array) as bool_min, array_min(int_array) as int_min, array_min(bigint_array) as bigint_min, array_min(double_array) as double_min, array_min(string_array) as string_min, array_min(decimal_array) as decimal_min FROM INPUT;

sources.schema: `ID` STRING KEY, `BOOL_MIN` BOOLEAN, `INT_MIN` INTEGER, `BIGINT_MIN` BIGINT, `DOUBLE_MIN` DOUBLE, `STRING_MIN` STRING, `DECIMAL_MIN` DECIMAL(2, 1)
